panels.title: $cluster - Count of WALs waiting to be archived

matcher.options: Hardware Corrupted - Amount of RAM that the kernel identified as corrupted / not working

targets.expr:
avg by (node_name) ((rate(node_vmstat_pswpin{}[$interval]) * 4096 or 
irate(node_vmstat_pswpin{}[5m]) * 4096) + 
(rate(node_vmstat_pswpout{}[$interval]) * 4096 or 
irate(node_vmstat_pswpout{}[5m]) * 4096))
